info.author: Giacomo Spettoli
info.description:
Introduction
============

The ``plonetheme.discovery`` package uses the *theming & packaging* features
available in `plone.app.theming`_ to make the theme `discovery`_ easily
available in `Plone 4.1`_.

.. image:: http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/plonetheme.discovery/trunk/screenshot.png

.. _`discovery`: http://www.freecsstemplates.org/preview/discovery/
.. _`plone.app.theming`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/plone.app.theming
.. _`Plone 4.1`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Plone/4.1rc2

Installation
=============

Add Plone site
---------------------

Install Plone 4.1 with `plone.app.theming`_ and create a Plone site (if you have not already)
with Diazo theming configured.

Zip file
---------------------

If you are an end user, you might enjoy installation via zip file import.

1. Download the zip file: http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/plonetheme.discovery/trunk/discovery.zip
2. Import the theme from the Diazo theme control panel.

Buildout
---------------------

If you are a developer, you might enjoy installation via buildout.

Add ``plonetheme.discovery`` to your ``plone.recipe.zope2instance`` section's *eggs* parameter e.g.::

    [instance]
    eggs =
        Plone
        plonetheme.discovery

Select theme
---------------------

Select and enable the theme from the Diazo control panel. That's it!

Changelog
=========

1.1 (2011-07-30)
----------------
- Fixed doctype [giacomos]

1.0 (2011-06-11)
----------------

- Initial release [giacomos]

info.summary: An installable Diazo theme for Plone 4.1

Introduction

The plonetheme.discovery package uses the theming & packaging features available in plone.app.theming to make the theme discovery easily available in Plone 4.1.

Installation

Install Plone 4.1 with plone.app.theming and create a Plone site (if you have not already) with Diazo theming configured.

If you are an end user, you might enjoy installation via zip file import.

  2. Import the theme from the Diazo theme control panel.

Buildout

If you are a developer, you might enjoy installation via buildout.

Add plonetheme.discovery to your plone.recipe.zope2instance section’s eggs parameter e.g.:

[instance]
eggs =
    Plone

Select theme

Select and enable the theme from the Diazo control panel. That’s it!
